gsdStudentName.name: Student Name
gsdStudentName.description: Full name of the student: Last Name, First Name (example: Smith, Jane). Use the name that the GSD Administrator has on file.

gsdRecommendation.name: Faculty Recommendation
gsdRecommendation.description: Indicate the recommendation(s) from the faculty for this project.

gsdSiteType.name: Site Type
gsdSiteType.description: Describe the type of building or site, based on function / purpose. Example: Military base.

gsdTags.name: GSD Tags
gsdTags.description: Use tags to describe the project. Write one keyword per field. To add more tags, click on the plus sign on the right.
